Description:
Job Details:Qualifications:BTech / MTech in Electrical/Electronics or Computer engineering 9 -18 years of experience (Mix of Development/Integration) in System software development of tablet or mobile products. Candidates expected to have exposure to all layers of stack in respective domains ( HW IP, firmware, drivers, framework and application), good understanding and experience in windows OS, windows device driver framework and platform debugging tools like logic analyzers, lauterbach, ITP etc,
Candidate should also have affinity towards stake holder management which involves discussing with domain architects, domain engineering team leads, Validation teams for triage, debug and provide solution for platform issues in the above-mentioned areas to effectively deliver system integration roleWork Model for this RoleJob Details
